channel.title: Trouble adding control panel to server
channel.description: hi, im having trouble adding a control panel to my server, this is the error i get [code]ControlPanel.java:284: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client c.sendMessage("[iPanel] You've been giving EXP on your account!"); ^[/code] idk how to define it, i tryed as a void but then the onstream.*'s gave off error that said cannot find symbol onstream, any help defineing it? or setting the variable?

item.title: Trouble adding control panel to server
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

tryed that, didn’t work it gave me this error:

ControlPanel.java:490: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class ControlPanel sendMessage("[PM: iPanel]: " + message); ^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 05:54:39 pm[/size][hr]then i added the void for sendMessage:

public void sendMessage(String s) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(253); outStream.writeString(s); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } 

ControlPanel.java:26: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable outStream
location: class ControlPanel
                outStream.createFrameVarSize(253);
                ^
ControlPanel.java:27: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable outStream
location: class ControlPanel
                outStream.writeString(s);
                ^
ControlPanel.java:28: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable outStream
location: class ControlPanel
                outStream.endFrameVarSize();
                ^

any help?

Read full topic
